summary: AN ORDINANCE adopting the 2011 Update to the City of Seattle 2009 - 2012 Consolidated Plan for Housing and Community Development, as amended, including an annual allocation plan and revisions to policies for the use of the City's funding resources for housing and community development; authorizing the submission of the 2011 Update to the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development; and authorizing the Human Services Director to make changes to the Plan for certain purposes.
committee: Housing, Human Services, Health, and Culture
